1557750.name: Rolling Hamster Soundtrack + Wallpaper
1557750.description:
Rolling Hamster Original Soundtrack from Sylvain Delépée and main theme composed and interpreted by the trio Dennis Vercauteren, Issam Labbene & Téo Crommen + 3 4K wallpaper Rolling Hamster.

Full game sold separately.

Soundtrack (MP3+FLAC) and wallpaper will be located in the following folder upon installation:
PC: "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\music\"
